Commit Description: Add YouTube channel to social  Support channels, by adding youtube_channel, and youtube_channel_name, since most names are randomly generated IDs, e.g. UCvmINlrza7JHB1zkIOuXEbw). For example, youtube_channel: UCvmINlrza7JHB1zkIOuXEbw youtube_channel_name: jekyll  This preserves the existing youtube_username setting, since it should will support the other URL systems on YouTube, legacy usernames and new custom URLs, see: https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/6180214
